library(knitr)

    citep("10.1007/s004420050419")

    citep("10.1111/j.0030-1299.2004.13193.x")

    citep("10.2307/2937124")

    citep("10.1111/oik.01314")
    # mizer paper
    citep("10.1111/2041-210X.12256")

    citep("10.3354/meps206227")

    citep("10.1016/j.cub.2014.03.026")
    # Rogers 2017 - data method
    citep("10.1002/ecy.2103")
    # Rogers 2018 - less fisheries value
    citep("10.1002/ecy.2103")
    # Newton 2007 - coral reef fisheries are minimally selective
    citep("10.1016/j.cub.2007.02.054.")
    # Hatcher 1988 Detritus sink rate 80%
    citep("10.1016/0169-5347(88)90117-6.")

    citep("10.1111/1365-2664.14458")
